message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the section "Cash and Cash Equivalents" that contains:
- Beginning Balance: 20000000.00
- Ending Balance: 498569.02
- Net Increase: -19501430.98

The line item that represents cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is "Beginning Balance" with the value of 20000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20000000.00'} }
```
